name: quantummint
description: A comprehensive system for generating digital money and enabling cash-out functionality

scripts.install:all: npm run install:api-gateway && npm run install:auth-service && npm run install:money-generation && npm run install:transaction-service && npm run install:payment-integration && npm run install:frontend
scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:api-gateway" "npm run start:auth-service" "npm run start:money-generation" "npm run start:transaction-service" "npm run start:payment-integration"
scripts.test:all: concurrently "npm run test:api-gateway" "npm run test:auth-service" "npm run test:money-generation" "npm run test:transaction-service" "npm run test:payment-integration" "npm run test:frontend"

author: NinjaTech AI
